html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-09622023-09-28DND
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of PHILIP JOHN BATES of South Frontenac, Ontario, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as Principal of the Royal Military College of Canada, on an interim basis, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five months or until such time as as a new Principal is appointed, effective October 1, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of PHILIP JOHN BATES of South Frontenac, Ontario, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as Principal of the Royal Military College of Canada,  on an interim basis, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five months or until such time as as a new Principal is appointed, effective October 1, 2023.
